title: Canterbury: home of handweaving
brief_description: Hand weaving loom and spinning wheel manufacture in a Canterbury workshop. Shows the care and skill used in the production of these machines, each the work of one craftsman. At the Cathedral Weaving Centre, weavers can buy materials and learn the art of making fine hand-woven.
